description: PostgreSQL Catalog Explorer for Single Instance

targets.rawSql: SELECT * FROM pigsty.node_summary Where is_meta;
SELECT d.key, d.value FROM pigsty.global_var v, jsonb_each_text(v.value) d WHERE v.key = 'dcs_servers'
SELECT cls, is_meta FROM pigsty.group

SELECT  key, to_json(value) #>> '{}' AS value FROM pigsty.global_var WHERE key
    in ('nginx_port', 'repo_address', 'nginx_home', 'repo_name');

SELECT d ->> 'name'     AS name,
       (d ->> 'domain') AS domain,
       d ->> 'endpoint' AS endpoint
FROM pigsty.global_var v,
     jsonb_array_elements(v.value) d
WHERE v.key = 'nginx_upstream';

WITH nginx AS (
    SELECT d ->> 'name'     AS name,
           d ->> 'domain'   AS domain,
           d ->> 'endpoint' AS endpoint
    FROM pigsty.global_var v,
         jsonb_array_elements(v.value) d
    WHERE v.key = 'nginx_upstream'),
     nginx_indexes AS (
         SELECT d ->> 'name'    AS name,
                d ->> 'url'     AS domain,
                d ->> 'comment' AS comment
         FROM pigsty.global_var v,
              jsonb_array_elements(v.value) d
         WHERE v.key = 'nginx_indexes')
SELECT name,
       comment,
       case
           when starts_with(domain, '/') THEN (SELECT 'http://' || domain FROM nginx WHERE name = 'home' LIMIT 1) ||
                                              domain
           ELSE replace(domain, '${grafana}', (SELECT 'http://' || domain FROM nginx WHERE name = 'grafana' LIMIT 1))
           END AS url
FROM nginx_indexes
;
SELECT  to_json(value) #>> '{}' AS "DCS Type" FROM pigsty.global_var WHERE key = 'pg_dcs_type';
SELECT d.key, d.value FROM pigsty.global_var v, jsonb_each_text(v.value) d WHERE v.key = 'dcs_servers'

SELECT  key, to_json(value) #>> '{}' AS value FROM pigsty.global_var WHERE key
    in ('node_repo_method', 'node_repo_remove');

SELECT
        d ->> 'name' AS name,
        d ->> 'baseurl'  AS domain,
        d ->> 'description' AS comment
FROM pigsty.global_var v,
     jsonb_array_elements(v.value) d
WHERE v.key = 'repo_upstreams';

SELECT pkg
FROM pigsty.global_var v,
     jsonb_array_elements_text(v.value) pkg
WHERE v.key = 'repo_packages'
UNION ALL
SELECT pkg
FROM pigsty.global_var v,
     jsonb_array_elements_text(v.value) pkg
WHERE v.key = 'repo_url_packages';

WITH ver AS (SELECT  to_json(value) #>> '{}' AS "version" FROM pigsty.global_var WHERE key = 'pg_version' LIMIT 1)
SELECT replace(pkg, '${pg_version}' , (SELECT version FROM ver LIMIT 1))
FROM pigsty.global_var v, jsonb_array_elements_text(v.value) pkg
WHERE v.key = 'pg_packages'
UNION ALL
SELECT replace(pkg, '${pg_version}' , (SELECT version FROM ver LIMIT 1))
FROM pigsty.global_var v, jsonb_array_elements_text(v.value) pkg
WHERE v.key = 'pg_extensions'

SELECT pkg
FROM pigsty.global_var v,
     jsonb_array_elements_text(v.value) pkg
WHERE v.key = 'node_packages_default'
UNION ALL
SELECT pkg
FROM pigsty.global_var v,
     jsonb_array_elements_text(v.value) pkg
WHERE v.key = 'node_packages';

SELECT pkg
FROM pigsty.global_var v,
     jsonb_array_elements_text(v.value) pkg
WHERE v.key = 'node_packages_meta'
UNION ALL
SELECT to_json(value) #>> '{}' AS "DCS Type" FROM pigsty.global_var WHERE key = 'node_packages_meta_pip';
SELECT  to_json(value) #>> '{}' AS "DNS Enabled" FROM pigsty.global_var WHERE key = 'nameserver_enabled';

SELECT pkg
FROM pigsty.global_var v,
     jsonb_array_elements_text(v.value) pkg
WHERE v.key = 'dns_records';

SELECT pkg
FROM pigsty.global_var v,
     jsonb_array_elements_text(v.value) pkg
WHERE v.key = 'node_dns_options'
UNION ALL
SELECT pkg
FROM pigsty.global_var v,
     jsonb_array_elements_text(v.value) pkg
WHERE v.key = 'node_dns_servers';

SELECT pkg
FROM pigsty.global_var v,
     jsonb_array_elements_text(v.value) pkg
WHERE v.key = 'node_etc_hosts_default'
UNION ALL
SELECT pkg
FROM pigsty.global_var v,
     jsonb_array_elements_text(v.value) pkg
WHERE v.key = 'node_etc_hosts';
SELECT  to_json(value) #>> '{}' AS "Node DNS Method" FROM pigsty.global_var WHERE key = 'node_dns_method';
SELECT * FROM pigsty.pg_cluster
SELECT * FROM pigsty.pg_instance
SELECT * FROM pigsty.pg_service;
SELECT * FROM pigsty.pg_database;

title: CMDB Overview
author: Vonng (rh@vonng.com)
